abstract: Google’s Buzz service scans a user’s Gmail contact list to automatically create a social network. Critics say the process violates customer privacy.
snippet: Google’s Buzz service scans a user’s Gmail contact list to automatically create a social network. Critics say the process violates customer privacy.
lead_paragraph: Update | 11:11 p.m. Google implemented changes to Buzz late Thursday that make it easier to adjust settings.

headline.main: The Negative Buzz Around Google’s New Social Network
